patterns: What are the general requirements for college admission?
responses: Generally there are 3 types of admissions provided namely Management Quota, Government Quota &NRI Quota. The  eligibility criterias depend upon the admission type

patterns: What are the requirements for government/Merit quota admission?
responses: Nationality : Candidates must be citizens of india. Age: must have completed 17 years of age. Academic requirements: should have passed higher secondary exam of board of higher secondary education kerala or an exam equivalent to it with atleast 45% marks in Phy, Chem and Mathematics. Entrance exam : KEAM

patterns: What are the requirements for management quota admission?
responses: Nationality : Candidates must be citizens of india. Age: must have completed 17 years of age. Academic requirements: should have passed higher secondary exam of board of higher secondary education kerala or an exam equivalent to it with atleast 45% marks in Phy, Chem and Mathematics. Entrance exam : KEAM

patterns: What are the requirements for NRI quota admission?
responses: 15% of seats are for admitting qualified students who are dependent of Non-resident Indians.These students are exempted from qualifying in any entrance test and can be admitted based in their academic eligibility as stipulated by APJ Abdul Kalam Technological University. For further details on NRI admissions, Contact: Prof.Anitha P : +91 9446523599

Students are provided accommodation on seperate boys and girls hostel.To know more about Men's hostel visit : https://www.adishankara.ac.in/admission/boys-hostel-admissions To know more about Ladies hostel visit:https://www.adishankara.ac.in/admission/girls-hostel-admissions
